executive_summary: Phuvit Jaruratkit is a skilled backend developer with a strong foundation in data science and engineering. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Data Science, Phuvit has hands-on experience in SQL, Python, and various backend technologies. Their work experience includes developing and managing databases, contributing to software application engineering, and utilizing cloud services for database management. Phuvit is eager to learn and adapt, making them a promising candidate for the Data Engineer role.

fit_analysis.overall_assessment: Phuvit possesses a solid background in backend development and data management, which aligns well with the requirements of the Data Engineer position. Their experience with SQL and Python, along with their ongoing education in Data Science, positions them as a strong candidate. However, while they have some exposure to big data tools, further experience in tools like Spark and Hadoop would enhance their fit for this role.

experience: Backend Developer at Sennalabs with SQL and NodeJS
Full-Stack Developer at Wanget Co. JP. managing databases
notable_achievements: Developed an E-commerce platform using modern web technologies
Managed database systems using AWS RDS
Contributed to software engineering lifecycle in multiple roles

skills_gaps: Experience with big data tools such as Spark and Hadoop
experience_gaps: Hands-on experience with data pipeline creation and maintenance
recommendations: Engage in projects or courses focused on big data technologies
Seek mentorship or opportunities to lead small projects to develop leadership skills

interesting_fact: Phuvit has experience developing a web application for Japanese hospitals, showcasing their ability to work on impactful projects that serve real-world needs.
